content.prompt: Article V’s call for “equality in fact” is best seen as evidence for the influence of which of the following on Bakunin’s thinking?

choices.label: Marxist ideals of scientific and material determinism
Conservative ideals of renewed faith in religious authorities

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
